title: Venus in Scorpio
summary: Affection turns intense, loyal, and investigative. Desire seeks depth and honesty, with little patience for superficiality. The opportunity is to cultivate trust through transparency and respect for boundaries.

meaning.headline: Connection wants depth, truth, and emotional courage.

frames.text: Venus in Scorpio values loyalty, candor, and bonds that can handle vulnerability.
Surface-level interactions feel less satisfying; substance matters.
Curiosity about motives and power dynamics rises.
Intimacy deepens when both parties share willingly.

opportunities: Honest conversations about needs and boundaries

do: State what depth looks like for you.
Ask for consent before diving into heavy topics.
Honor secrets you are trusted with.
avoid: Using fear or scarcity to keep closeness

reusable_lines.text: Depth grows through consented honesty, not pressure.
Intensity can heal when it is paired with respect.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can highlight desire for depth and honesty
Agency-forward language: you choose what to reveal and protect
Contextual framing: intensity helps when consent and care are present

sources: Venus as relating/values archetype in daily cycles
